Reviews.Title: The only value here is the lens cleaning rag.
Reviews.Author: Francis Bartley Jr.
Reviews.Content: This lens is not correct for the Nikon D3200. While it fits it is also far too distorted to be of any value. I did increase zoom at a 55 setting but by the time you extended the master lens to 50% of the zoom capacity in this case around 150 it was completely clouded and would not even manually focus. Not really even worth one star in my book

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Juan Botero Londoño "Juan"
Reviews.Content: Awful, dont even worth to carry it in your bag, distorted view, low light, awful photos. Used once to try it on a d5200 with 55-300 4.5 - 5.6 nikor lens
